avenue.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a possible way of achieving something
avenue.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The president wants to explore every avenue towards peace in the region.
There are many avenues open to researchers.
avenue.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a road or broad path between two rows of trees, especially one leading to a big house
avenue.translation[1].definitions[0].def: used in the names of streets in a town or city
